descriptionHtml:
Once in a lifetime everbody has to return to the Source, both phisically and metaphisically.
What you will find here is not an adventure, not a fight-for-life battle, nor even a big challenge.
You won\'t get any new abilities, spells, armors, potions etc.

But if you go through the path you will eventually find the source and maybe something else you might have not expected. Life is not about the end; it is about Life itself. 

If I need a little peace of mind or just a little rest between two bloody slaughters I always return here and brood over the meaning of life, the universe and everything.

I hope you will also find your answers to your big questions, near Ivarstead.

Just download, put the \'.esp\' file into your Data folder and you are ready to go.

No DLCs (Dawnguard, Hearthfire) needed just Skyrim 1.7 and up.

Always feel free to ask and comment! Constructive ideas are also welcome.
author: Lbukki
